channel.title: Garry's Mod support
channel.description: Does Black Mesa have GMod support? I'm thinking of buying it, and I wanna mess around with BM props and whatnot.

item.title: Garry's Mod support
item.dc:creator: M4TT
item.description:
Sweet, I guess I’m getting GMod then! Thanks a million.

Read full topic

item.title: Garry's Mod support
item.dc:creator: Blooper_Reel
item.description:
BMS stuff works perfectly fine in gmod excluding one little issue.

Since the face creation system is done using facial flexes, the faceposer tool will detect them as viable flexes. Unfortunately, the normal faceposer is only limited to so many flexes, so many of them will not work. Thankfully, there’s a stool designed to work with Black mesa ragdolls to get around this problem.

Apart from that, everything should work fine!

Read full topic
